Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20582308]dengue 2 virus(DENV-2):inhibition of virus infection in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=36±6  μM,57% inhibition at 50μM).

Literature.Title: Structural optimization and de novo design of dengue virus entry inhibitory peptides.
